description: TGS Design System Inheritance - Migrate to TGS styling with Fugue font, OKLCH colors, terracotta accent, and shadcn/ui components

userStories.title: Copy Fugue font file
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Fugue font file in the michelle-liu project so typography matches TGS.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify font file exists at public/fonts/fugue_regular.woff2

userStories.title: Install required dependencies
userStories.description: As a developer, I need CVA, tailwind-merge, and clsx for component variants and class merging.

userStories.title: Create lib/utils.ts with cn() helper

acceptanceCriteria: Export cn() function using clsx and tailwind-merge

userStories.title: Update layout.tsx with TGS font stack
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the same font registration as TGS so all fonts are available via CSS variables.
acceptanceCriteria: Register Fugue via next/font/local with --font-sans variable (weight range 300-500)
Register Geist Sans via next/font/google with --font-geist-sans
Apply all font variables to body className
Body uses font-sans antialiased as default
